holidays.title: National Sisters Day
holidays.description: Sisters have a deep connection that grows throughout childhood and remains strong throughout life.

holidays.title: American Family Day
holidays.description: This day celebrates the bonds that laid the foundation for our lives, be it blood or otherwise.

holidays.title: Assistance Dog Day
holidays.description: Celebrate man’s best friend because it’s Assistance Dog Day here at National Today!

holidays.title: Cook Islands Constitution Day
holidays.description: Learn the fascinating history of the Cook Islands and its citizens on Constitution Day.

holidays.title: Founder's Day
holidays.description: Learn how Ghana gained its independence and what makes The Black Stars so special.

holidays.title: Hooray for Kids Day
holidays.description: Check out why — and how — you, too, should celebrate Hooray for Kids Day.

holidays.title: International Clouded Leopard Day
holidays.description: About 10,000 endangered clouded leopards need you to celebrate International Clouded Leopard Day.

holidays.title: Matice Slovenska Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the birth of the scientific and cultural institution with Slovakians across the globe.

holidays.title: National White Wine Day
holidays.description: National White Wine Day on August 4 is the perfect opportunity to enjoy a glass of this very versatile drink. White wines make for great…

holidays.title: Psychic Day
holidays.description: This day recognizes the power of psychics and raises awareness about this ability.

holidays.title: Single Working Women's Day
holidays.description: As its name implies, this day celebrates all those women who are gainfully employed.

holidays.title: U.S. Coast Guard Birthday
holidays.description: On the U.S. Coast Guard Birthday, we commemorate the military organization for its valor and discipline.

holidays.title: Bobby Shmurda’s Birthday
holidays.description: This man carved his name in music history by creating a trademark unique to himself.

holidays.title: Cole Sprouse’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate this talented actor who has built a huge name for himself in the industry.

holidays.title: Kyle Cooke’s Birthday
holidays.description: This engaging television and social media star has his fans’ eyes glued to their screens.

holidays.title: Lil Skies’s Birthday
holidays.description: Music has been a part of this talented rapper’s life since he was a child.

holidays.title: Louis Armstrong’s Birthday
holidays.description: Armstrong’s contribution to jazz is immeasurable. He transformed it from folk into a serious art form.

holidays.title: Louis Vuitton’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented designer built a multi-million-dollar company from scratch and his legend lives on.

holidays.title: Marques Houston’s Birthday
holidays.description: His consistency and hard work have led to him becoming the best at what he does.

holidays.title: Meghan Markle’s Birthday
holidays.description: She may have married into royalty, but this duchess has always been a true queen.
